content: With the Preservation Orb equipped upon resurrection in a battle, your maximum health mana, and stamina will be increased for a long duration.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Preservation_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Preservation Orb'.
The content is as follows:
With the Preservation Orb equipped upon resurrection in a battle, your maximum health mana, and stamina will be increased for a long duration.
